alert.note: Alert for Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 11:32AM CDT until May 14 at 4:36AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Missouri... Illinois... Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau and Thebes. .Recent heavy rainfall upstream will gradually move water levels from minor to moderate flood stage next week. For the Mississippi River...including Cape Girardeau, Thebes... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Thebes. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Friday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 32.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 37.0 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
